description: It does what it says it does, and the results look cool. Also the softwere center needs more reviews.
Simple to use app that does what it says on the box. Image customization options are thurough enough
summary: Simple to use app that does what it says on the box

description: I revoked access to /tmp via flatseal, everythink continues to work of course, as it will see a sandboxed /tmp
summary: nice! could remove access to /tmp tho

description:
Title: Simple and Intuitive, but Missing Key Features

Rating: ★★★★☆

This app excels in simplicity and user-friendliness, providing an accessible experience for all users. However, it could benefit from enhancements like Atkinson dithering and greyscale conversion for creative flexibility. Additionally, the option to zoom into the preview image would improve precision for users working on detailed projects. With these additions, the app has the potential to become an even more versatile and appealing tool.
summary: Simple and Intuitive, but Missing Key Features

description: Siempre me ha gustado la estética de las imágenes con paleta de colores reducida que se veían en el pasado, y aunque desde antes he creado mis propias imágenes usando softwares de diseño (como el Exportar para Web de Photoshop), se me ha sido un proceso pesado, y gracias a este programa lo tengo mucho más simplificado y con un programa que se centra solo en eso :D
